### 🎈・Code example

Example of how you can use [traps](https://pypi.org/project/traps/)

```python
import traps

traps.get()

# or

traps.get(
  "yes", # directory name (default: "traps")
  5 # amount of traps (default: randint(5, 10))
)
```
